channel.title: Vps/dedi
channel.description: Ok so I have this problem that my parents always turn the internet off when we go to sleep, (If I let it on they'll get freakin' mad :o) so I was wondering.. Do you need to have an internet connection on your computer if you are hosting via a VPS or dedi?

item.title: Vps/dedi
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

uhm not at all but you will need it to connect to it. Like to get your server on it and after its running then you can turn your internet off

Read full topic
